tooltip.description: Displayed to the user when she moves her mouse over the extension's `pageAction` icon.

successfulAuth.description: Displayed to the user when she successfully authenticates to Instapaper.

failedAuth.description: Displayed to the user when she enters a bad username/password combination.

errorAuth.description: Displayed to the user when the authentication fails with an error state (e.g. couldn't connect to Instapaper).

formTitle.description: The title of the setup form.

usernameLabel.description: The label of the username field in the setup form.

passwordLabel.description: The label of the password field in the setup form.

saveLabel.description: The label of the setup form submission button.
